freesmartphone.org Framework DBus Interface Specification

org.freesmartphone.Network

Description

The Network interface provides access to high level networking functions. Please see org.moblin.connman for low level networking functions.

Namespace

org.freesmartphone.Network

Methods

  • StartConnectionSharingWithInterface

Signals

None

Errors

  • NoInterface

Methods

StartConnectionSharingWithInterface ( s )

Description: Start sharing the internet connection of this device with any clients connected to the specified network interface. As a consequence of this call, a dhcp server will be started on the device and ip tables will be adjusted.

Parameters

s: interface

The interface to start sharing the connectivity with.

Errors

NoInterface

Description: Raised, when the requested interface is not present.
